original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: The suchness of ultimate emptiness is not found in the Tathāgata.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid la'ang de @157b bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid la'ang de @157b bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so // de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: The Tathāgata is not found in the real nature of ultimate emptiness.🔽The real nature of ultimate emptiness is not found in the Tathāgata.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so // de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: The Tathāgata is not found in the suchness of compounded emptiness.🔽The suchness of compounded emptiness is not found in the Tathāgata.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so // de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: The Tathāgata is not found in the real nature of compounded emptiness.🔽The real nature of compounded emptiness is not found in the Tathāgata.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The Tathāgata is not found in the suchness of uncompounded emptiness.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of the uncompounded is not apprehended in the Tathāgata,🔽and the Tathāgata is not apprehended in the real nature of the emptiness of the uncompounded.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid mi dmigs so //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so // de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid mi dmigs so // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The real nature of the emptiness of the uncompounded is not apprehended in the Tathāgata,🔽and the Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the emptiness of the uncompounded.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes is not apprehended in the Tathāgata,🔽and the Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the real nature of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes,🔽and the real nature of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs @158a *//
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs @158a *//
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of the beginningless and endless is not apprehended in the Tathāgata,🔽and the Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the emptiness of the beginningless and endless.

original: pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the emptiness of inherent existence, nor is the emptiness of inherent existence apprehended in the Thus-Gone One.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so // de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the suchness of the emptiness of inherent existence, nor is the suchness of the emptiness of inherent existence apprehended in the Thus-Gone One.🔽The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the real nature of the emptiness of inherent existence, nor is the real nature of the emptiness of inherent existence apprehended in the Thus-Gone One.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the thusness of the emptiness of inherent existence, nor is the thusness of the emptiness of inherent existence apprehended in the Thus-Gone One.🔽The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the emptiness of what is not to be discarded, nor is the emptiness of what is not to be discarded apprehended in the Thus-Gone One.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //🔽dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so // dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the suchness of the emptiness of what is not to be discarded, nor is the suchness of the emptiness of what is not to be discarded apprehended in the Thus-Gone One.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the real nature of the emptiness of what is not to be discarded, nor is the real nature of the emptiness of what is not to be discarded apprehended in the Thus-Gone One.🔽The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the thusness of the emptiness of what is not to be discarded, nor is the thusness of the emptiness of what is not to be discarded apprehended in the Thus-Gone One.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the emptiness of inherent nature.🔽The suchness of the emptiness of inherent nature is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the intrinsic nature of the emptiness of inherent nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid mi dmigs so //🔽chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so // de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid mi dmigs so // chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The intrinsic nature of the emptiness of inherent nature is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of all phenomena is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the intrinsic nature of the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: chos @158b thams cad stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: chos @158b thams cad stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: The intrinsic nature of the emptiness of all phenomena is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The Suchness of the emptiness of defining attributes is also not apprehended in the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //🔽rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The Suchness of the Tathāgata is also not apprehended in the emptiness of defining attributes.🔽The Tathāgata is also not apprehended in the true nature of the emptiness of defining attributes.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: The true nature of the Tathāgata is also not apprehended in the emptiness of defining attributes.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The Tathāgata is also not apprehended in the suchness of the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is also not apprehended in the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: The Tathāgata is also not apprehended in the true nature of the emptiness of non-apprehension.🔽The true nature of the Tathāgata is also not apprehended in the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the emptiness of non-things.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //🔽dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of non-things is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the real nature of the emptiness of non-things.🔽The real nature of the emptiness of non-things is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid mi dmigs so //🔽ngo bo @159a *//🔽nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid mi dmigs so // ngo bo @159a *// nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so // de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The suchness of the emptiness of inherent existence is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the real nature of the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The real nature of the emptiness of inherent existence is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: In the suchness of the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an entity, the Thus-Gone One is not apprehended.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: In the Thus-Gone One, the suchness of the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an entity is not apprehended.🔽In the intrinsic nature of the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an entity, the Thus-Gone One is not apprehended.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid mi dmigs so ////
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid mi dmigs so ////
translated: In the Thus-Gone One, the intrinsic nature of the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an entity is not apprehended.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
translated: The Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: bam po brgya bcu gcig pa //🔽dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: bam po brgya bcu gcig pa // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: Scroll One Hundred and Eleven🔽In the suchness of the applications of mindfulness, the Thus-Gone One is not apprehended.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang dran pa nye par bzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang dran pa nye par bzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: In the Thus-Gone One, the suchness of the applications of mindfulness is not apprehended.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The Thus-Gone One cannot be observed in the reality of the applications of mindfulness.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i chos nyid mi dmigs so //🔽yang dag par spong ba'i de bzhin nyid @159b la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i chos nyid mi dmigs so // yang dag par spong ba'i de bzhin nyid @159b la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The reality of the applications of mindfulness cannot be observed in the Thus-Gone One.🔽The Thus-Gone One cannot be observed in the suchness of the authentic eliminations.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang yang dag par spong ba'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //🔽yang dag par spong ba'i chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang yang dag par spong ba'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so // yang dag par spong ba'i chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The suchness of the authentic eliminations cannot be observed in the Thus-Gone One.🔽The Thus-Gone One cannot be observed in the reality of the authentic eliminations.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang yang dag par spong ba'i chos nyid mi dmigs so //🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang yang dag par spong ba'i chos nyid mi dmigs so // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The reality of the authentic eliminations cannot be observed in the Thus-Gone One.🔽The Thus-Gone One cannot be observed in the suchness of the bases of miraculous power.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: The suchness of the bases of miraculous power cannot be observed in the Thus-Gone One.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i chos nyid mi dmigs so //🔽dbang po'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so // de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i chos nyid mi dmigs so // dbang po'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The Thus-Gone One cannot be observed in the real nature of the bases of supernatural powers.🔽The real nature of the bases of supernatural powers cannot be observed in the Thus-Gone One.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang dbang po'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //🔽dbang po'i chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang dbang po'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so // dbang po'i chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The Thus-Gone One cannot be observed in the real nature of the faculties.🔽The real nature of the faculties cannot be observed in the Thus-Gone One.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang dbang po'i chos nyid mi dmigs so //🔽stobs kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang dbang po'i chos nyid mi dmigs so // stobs kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The Thus-Gone One cannot be observed in the real nature of the faculties.🔽The real nature of the faculties cannot be observed in the Thus-Gone One.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang stobs kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //🔽stobs kyi chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang stobs kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so // stobs kyi chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The Thus-Gone One cannot be observed in the real nature of the powers.🔽The real nature of the powers cannot be observed in the Thus-Gone One.🔽The Thus-Gone One cannot be observed in the real nature of the powers.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang stobs kyi chos nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang stobs kyi chos nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: The real nature of the powers cannot be observed in the Thus-Gone One.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag gi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag gi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The Thus-Gone One cannot be observed in the suchness of the branches of awakening.

original: @160a *// de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang byang chub kyi yan lag gi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //🔽byang chub kyi yan lag gi chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: @160a *// de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang byang chub kyi yan lag gi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so // byang chub kyi yan lag gi chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The suchness of the branches of awakening cannot be observed in the Thus-Gone One.🔽The Thus-Gone One cannot be observed in the real nature of the branches of awakening.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang byang chub kyi yan lag gi chos nyid mi dmigs so //🔽'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang byang chub kyi yan lag gi chos nyid mi dmigs so // 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The real nature of the branches of awakening cannot be observed in the Thus-Gone One.🔽The Thus-Gone One cannot be observed in the suchness of the noble eightfold path.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //🔽'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so // 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The suchness of the noble eightfold path cannot be observed in the Thus-Gone One.🔽The Thus-Gone One cannot be observed in the real nature of the noble eightfold path.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chos nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chos nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: The real nature of the noble eightfold path cannot be observed in the Thus-Gone One.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The Thus-Gone One cannot be observed in the suchness of the noble truths.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang 'phags pa'i bden pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //🔽'phags pa'i bden pa'i chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang 'phags pa'i bden pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so // 'phags pa'i bden pa'i chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The suchness of the noble truths cannot be observed in the Thus-Gone One.🔽The Thus-Gone One cannot be observed in the intrinsic nature of the noble truths.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang 'phags pa'i bden pa'i chos nyid mi dmigs so //🔽bsam gtan gyi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang 'phags pa'i bden pa'i chos nyid mi dmigs so // bsam gtan gyi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The intrinsic nature of the noble truths cannot be observed in the Thus-Gone One.🔽The Thus-Gone One cannot be observed in the suchness of the concentrations.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang bsam gtan gyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //🔽bsam gtan gyi chos nyid la'ang de @160b bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang bsam gtan gyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so // bsam gtan gyi chos nyid la'ang de @160b bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The suchness of the concentrations cannot be observed in the Thus-Gone One.🔽The Thus-Gone One cannot be observed in the intrinsic nature of the concentrations.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang bsam gtan gyi chos nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang bsam gtan gyi chos nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: The intrinsic nature of the concentrations cannot be observed in the Thus-Gone One.

original: tshad med pa'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshad med pa'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The Thus-Gone One cannot be observed in the suchness of the immeasurables.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang tshad med pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang tshad med pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: The suchness of the tathāgatas is not apprehended as immeasurable.

original: tshad med pa'i chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshad med pa'i chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The tathāgatas are not apprehended in the suchness of immeasurable [phenomena].

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang tshad med pa'i chos nyid mi dmigs so //🔽gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang tshad med pa'i chos nyid mi dmigs so // gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The suchness of the tathāgatas is not apprehended as immeasurable.🔽The tathāgatas are not apprehended in the suchness of the formless absorptions.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //🔽gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so // gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The suchness of the tathāgatas is not apprehended in the formless absorptions.🔽The tathāgatas are not apprehended in the suchness of the formless absorptions.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i chos nyid mi dmigs so //🔽rnam par thar pa'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i chos nyid mi dmigs so // rnam par thar pa'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The suchness of the tathāgatas is not apprehended in the suchness of the formless absorptions.🔽The tathāgatas are not apprehended in the suchness of the liberations.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang rnam par thar pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang rnam par thar pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: The suchness of the tathāgatas is not apprehended in the liberations.

original: rnam par thar pa'i chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the reality of liberation.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang rnam par thar pa'i chos nyid mi dmigs so //🔽mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang rnam par thar pa'i chos nyid mi dmigs so // mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The reality of liberation is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the serial absorptions.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang mthar @161a *//🔽gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang mthar @161a *// gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: The suchness of the serial absorptions is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the reality of the serial absorptions.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i chos nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so // de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i chos nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: The reality of the serial absorptions is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are doors of liberation.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //🔽rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so // rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the reality of the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gateways to liberation.🔽The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gateways to liberation.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: The reality of the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gateways to liberation is not apprehended in the Thus-Gone One.

original: mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so // de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the reality of the superknowledges.🔽The reality of the superknowledges is not apprehended in the Thus-Gone One.

original: mngon par shes pa'i chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang mngon par shes pa'i chos nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa'i chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang mngon par shes pa'i chos nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the reality of the superknowledges.🔽The reality of the superknowledges is not apprehended in the Thus-Gone One.

original: ting nge @161b 'dzin gyi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ting nge @161b 'dzin gyi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The suchness of meditative stabilization is also not found in the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang ting nge 'dzin gyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //🔽ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang ting nge 'dzin gyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so // ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The Tathāgata is also not found in the suchness of meditative stabilization.🔽The suchness of the Tathāgata is also not found in the real nature of meditative stabilization.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid mi dmigs so //🔽gzungs kyi sgo'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid mi dmigs so // gzungs kyi sgo'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The real nature of the Tathāgata is also not found in the suchness of meditative stabilization.🔽The suchness of the dhāraṇī gateways is also not found in the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang gzungs kyi sgo'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //🔽gzungs kyi sgo'i chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang gzungs kyi sgo'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so // gzungs kyi sgo'i chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The Tathāgata is also not found in the suchness of the dhāraṇī gateways.🔽The suchness of the Tathāgata is also not found in the real nature of the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang gzungs kyi sgo'i chos nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang gzungs kyi sgo'i chos nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: The real nature of the Tathāgata is also not found in the suchness of the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The suchness of the powers of the Tathāgata is also not found in the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: the thusness of the tathāgatas’ powers is not found in the tathāgatas,🔽the tathāgatas are not found in the real nature of the tathāgatas’ powers,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi chos nyid mi dmigs so //🔽mi 'jigs pa'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi chos nyid mi dmigs so // mi 'jigs pa'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: the real nature of the tathāgatas’ powers is not found in the tathāgatas,🔽the tathāgatas are not found in the thusness of the fearlessnesses,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang mi 'jigs pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //🔽mi 'jigs pa'i chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang mi 'jigs pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so // mi 'jigs pa'i chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: the thusness of the fearlessnesses is not found in the tathāgatas,🔽the tathāgatas are not found in the real nature of the fearlessnesses,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang mi 'jigs pa'i chos nyid mi dmigs so //🔽so @162a *// so yang dag par rig pa'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang mi 'jigs pa'i chos nyid mi dmigs so // so @162a *// so yang dag par rig pa'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: the real nature of the fearlessnesses is not found in the tathāgatas,🔽the tathāgatas are not found in the thusness of the detailed and thorough knowledges,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang so so yang dag par rig pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang so so yang dag par rig pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: the thusness of the detailed and thorough knowledges is not found in the tathāgatas,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa'i chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa'i chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The Thus-Gone One cannot be apprehended in the real nature of the correct understandings.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang so so yang dag par rig pa'i chos nyid mi dmigs so //🔽byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang so so yang dag par rig pa'i chos nyid mi dmigs so // byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The real nature of the correct understandings cannot be apprehended in the Thus-Gone One.🔽The Thus-Gone One cannot be apprehended in the suchness of great love.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //🔽byams pa chen po'i chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so // byams pa chen po'i chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The suchness of great love cannot be apprehended in the Thus-Gone One.🔽The Thus-Gone One cannot be apprehended in the real nature of great love.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang byams pa chen po'i chos nyid mi dmigs so //🔽snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang byams pa chen po'i chos nyid mi dmigs so // snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The real nature of great love cannot be apprehended in the Thus-Gone One.🔽The Thus-Gone One cannot be apprehended in the suchness of great compassion.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //🔽snying rje chen po'i chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //🔽snying rje chen po'i chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The suchness of great compassion cannot be apprehended in the Thus-Gone One.🔽The Thus-Gone One cannot be apprehended in the real nature of great compassion.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang snying rje chen po'i chos nyid mi dmigs so //🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang snying rje chen po'i chos nyid mi dmigs so // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: the dharmatā of great compassion in the Tathāgata is not apprehended,🔽the Tathāgata in the suchness of the unique qualities of a buddha is not apprehended,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres @162b pa'i chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres @162b pa'i chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: the suchness of the unique qualities of a buddha in the Tathāgata is not apprehended,🔽the Tathāgata in the dharmatā of the unique qualities of a buddha is not apprehended,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i chos nyid mi dmigs so //🔽thams cad shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i chos nyid mi dmigs so // thams cad shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: the dharmatā of the unique qualities of a buddha in the Tathāgata is not apprehended,🔽the Tathāgata in the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects is not apprehended,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang thams cad shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang thams cad shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects in the Tathāgata is not apprehended,

original: thams cad shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: the Tathāgata in the dharmatā of the knowledge of all aspects is not apprehended,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang thams cad shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid mi dmigs so //🔽lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang thams cad shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid mi dmigs so // lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The dharmatā of the knowledge of all modes is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the knowledge of path aspects.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang lam gyi rnam pa shes ba nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //🔽lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang lam gyi rnam pa shes ba nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so // lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The suchness of the knowledge of path aspects is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the dharmatā of the knowledge of path aspects.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid mi dmigs so //🔽rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid mi dmigs so // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The dharmatā of the knowledge of path aspects is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: The suchness of the knowledge of all aspects is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the dharmatā of the knowledge of all aspects.🔽The dharmatā of the knowledge of all aspects is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid mi dmigs @163a *//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid mi dmigs @163a *//
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended as the real nature of omniscience.

original: so // koo shi ka /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: so // koo shi ka / de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: Kauśika,

original: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
translated: the Tathāgata is not associated with the suchness of form, nor is he disassociated from it.

original: gzugs kyi chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: gzugs kyi chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
translated: He is not associated with the real nature of form, nor is he disassociated from it.

original: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
translated: He is not associated with anything other than the suchness of form, nor is he disassociated from it.

original: gzugs kyi chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: gzugs kyi chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
translated: He is not associated with anything other than the real nature of form, nor is he disassociated from it.

original: koo shi ka /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni /🔽tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: koo shi ka / de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni / tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
translated: Kauśika,🔽the Tathāgata is not associated with the suchness of feeling, nor is he disassociated from it.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan ba'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan ba'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
translated: He is neither conjoined nor disjoined with anything other than the reality of the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: koo shi ka /

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni /

analyzed: dngos po med @175b pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //

analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
translated: He is neither conjoined with nor disjoined from anything other than the suchness of the formless absorptions.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
translated: He is neither conjoined with nor disjoined from anything other than the true nature of the formless absorptions.

original: koo shi ka /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: koo shi ka / de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: Kauśika!🔽The Tathāgata is neither conjoined with nor disjoined from

analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
translated: the suchness of the liberations.

original: rnam par thar pa'i chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //🔽rnam par thar pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan @178a *//
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no // rnam par thar pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan @178a *//

analyzed: dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
translated: It is neither associated with nor unassociated from anything other than the suchness of liberation.

original: rnam par thar pa'i chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
translated: It is neither associated with nor unassociated from anything other than the reality of liberation.

original: koo shi ka /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: koo shi ka / de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: Kauśika,🔽the Tathāgata is neither associated with nor unassociated from the suchness of the serial absorptions.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
translated: He is neither associated with nor unassociated from the reality of the serial absorptions.🔽He is neither associated with nor unassociated from anything other than the suchness of the serial absorptions.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
translated: He is neither associated with nor unassociated from the reality of the immaterial absorptions.🔽He is neither associated with nor unassociated from anything other than the reality of the immaterial absorptions.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
translated: He is neither associated with nor unassociated from the suchness of the immaterial absorptions.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
translated: it is neither conjoined nor disjoined with anything other than the non-existent reality of the meditative absorption of progressive abiding.

original: koo shi ka /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni /🔽rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //🔽rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: koo shi ka / de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no // rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
translated: Kauśika!🔽The Tathāgata is neither conjoined nor disjoined with the reality of the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness gateways to liberation.🔽He is neither conjoined nor disjoined with the reality of the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness gateways to liberation.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
translated: He is neither conjoined nor disjoined with anything other than the reality of the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness gateways to liberation.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / @178b mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / @178b mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
translated: It is not associated with or dissociated from the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all things, the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, the emptiness of essential nature, or the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: koo shi ka /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: koo shi ka / de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: Kauśika!🔽The Tathāgata is not associated with or dissociated from the suchness of the superknowledges.

original: mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //🔽mngon par shes pa'i chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no // mngon par shes pa'i chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
translated: He is not associated with or dissociated from the reality of the superknowledges.

original: mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
translated: He is not associated with or dissociated from anything other than the suchness of the superknowledges.

original: mngon par shes pa'i chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa'i chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
translated: He is not associated with or dissociated from anything other than the reality of the superknowledges.

original: koo shi ka /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: koo shi ka / de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: Kauśika!

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
translated: The Tathāgata is not associated with or dissociated from the suchness of the meditative stabilities.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
translated: the dharmatā of meditative stabilization is neither conjoined nor disjoined;

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
translated: what is not the dharmatā of meditative stabilization is neither conjoined nor disjoined.

original: koo shi ka /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: koo shi ka / de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: Kauśika,🔽the Tathāgata is not conjoined with or disjoined from

analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //

analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo'i chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
translated: the dharmatā of the dhāraṇī gateways is neither conjoined nor disjoined;

analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no // gzungs kyi sgo'i chos @179a *//

translated: Kauśika,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The Tathāgata is not conjoined with or disjoined from the suchness of the powers of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
translated: The Tathāgata is not conjoined with or disjoined from the real nature of the powers of the Tathāgata.

translated: The Tathāgata is not conjoined with or disjoined from the dharma-constituent of the powers of the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not conjoined with or disjoined from the dharma-element of the powers of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
translated: The Tathāgata is not conjoined with or disjoined from the inconceivable element of the powers of the Tathāgata.

original: koo shi ka /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni /🔽mi 'jigs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //

translated: Kauśika,🔽the Tathāgata is not conjoined with or disjoined from the suchness of the fearlessnesses of the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not conjoined with or disjoined from the real nature of the fearlessnesses of the Tathāgata.

original: mi 'jigs pa'i chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa'i chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
translated: The Tathāgata is not conjoined with or disjoined from the dharma-constituent of the fearlessnesses of the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not conjoined with or disjoined from the dharma-element of the fearlessnesses of the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not conjoined with or disjoined from the inconceivable element of the fearlessnesses of the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not conjoined with or disjoined from the essential nature of the fearlessnesses of the Tathāgata.

analyzed: mi 'jigs pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //

original: mi 'jigs pa'i chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa'i chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
translated: the reality of fearlessness is neither conjoined nor disjoined.

original: koo shi ka /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: koo shi ka / de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: Kauśika,🔽the Tathāgata is not conjoined with or disjoined from

analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //

original: so so yang dag par rig pa'i chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa'i chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
translated: the reality of the correct understandings is neither conjoined nor disjoined;

analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa'i de bzhin nyid ma @179b yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //

analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa'i chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
translated: the reality of the correct understandings is neither conjoined nor disjoined.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: the Tathāgata is not conjoined with or disjoined from🔽the suchness of the powers;

original: byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
translated: It is neither associated with nor unassociated with the thusness of great compassion.

original: byams pa chen po'i chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: byams pa chen po'i chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //

original: byams pa chen po 'di bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: byams pa chen po 'di bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
translated: It is neither associated with nor unassociated with anything other than the thusness of great compassion.

original: byams pa chen po'i chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: byams pa chen po'i chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
translated: It is neither associated with nor unassociated with anything other than the intrinsic nature of great compassion.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika!

original: de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni /🔽snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //🔽snying rje chen po'i chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni / snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no // snying rje chen po'i chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
translated: The Tathāgata is🔽neither associated with nor unassociated with the thusness of great compassion.🔽He is neither associated with nor unassociated with the intrinsic nature of great compassion.

original: snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
translated: He is neither associated with nor unassociated with anything other than the thusness of great compassion.

original: snying rje chen po'i chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
translated: It is not associated with or freed from anything other than the real nature of great compassion.

original: koo shi ka /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: koo shi ka / de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: Kauśika!🔽The Tathāgata is not associated with or freed from the suchness of the distinct qualities of the Buddha.

translated: He is not associated with or freed from the real nature of the distinct qualities of the Buddha.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
translated: He is not associated with or freed from anything other than the real nature of the distinct qualities of the Buddha.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika!

original: de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The Tathāgata is not associated with or freed from the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects.🔽He is not associated with or freed from the real nature of the knowledge of all aspects.

analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //

analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
translated: The true dharmic nature of the knowledge of all aspects is neither conjoined nor disjoined.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
translated: That which is not the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects is neither conjoined nor disjoined.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
translated: That which is not the true dharmic nature of the knowledge of all aspects is neither conjoined nor disjoined.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika!

original: de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni /🔽lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang ldan ba'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang ldan ba'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
translated: The Tathāgata is🔽neither conjoined nor disjoined with the suchness of the knowledge of path aspects.

analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //

analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //

original: koo shi ka /

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid dang ldan @180b pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
translated: is neither conjoined nor disjoined with anything other than the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no //
translated: is neither conjoined nor disjoined with anything other than the true dharmic nature of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: “Kauśika,

analyzed: 'di ni / gang chos 'di dag thams cad dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin pa de'i mthu ste /

analyzed: de'i byin gyi rlabs so ////

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //

analyzed: bam po brgya bcu gnyis pa /

analyzed: koo shi ka / gang yang 'di skad du / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /

analyzed: gang nas btsal bar bya zhes zer ba ni /
translated: if you ask, ‘In that case, where should the bodhisattva great beings seek the perfection of wisdom?’

analyzed: koo shi ka / gzugs las kyang btsal bar mi bya /

analyzed: tshor ba las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o // 'du shes las kyang btsal bar mi bya /

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: koo shi ka / de ni / 'di ltar gzugs gang yin pa dang / tshor ba gang yin pa dang / 'du shes gang yin pa dang / 'du byed gang yin pa dang / rnam @181a *//
translated: Kauśika,

analyzed: 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o //

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

analyzed: mig las kyang btsal bar mi bya / mig las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o // rna ba las kyang btsal bar mi bya /

analyzed: rna ba las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o // sna las kyang bcol bar mi bya /

analyzed: sna las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o // lce las kyang btsal bar mi bya /

original: yid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: yid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: de ni / 'di ltar mig gang yin pa dang / rna ba gang yin pa dang / sna gang yin pa dang / lce gang yin pa dang / lus gang yin pa dang / yid gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni /

translated: It is thus: that which is the eye, that which is the ear, that which is the nose, that which is the tongue, that which is the body, that which is the thinking mind, that which is the bodhisattva,

analyzed: ldan pa'ang ma yin mi @181b ldan pa'ang ma yin /

analyzed: koo shi ka /

original: de ni / 'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang /🔽yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni /
translated: it is because the sensory contact that is the coming together, the meeting, the convergence of the eye, the sensory contact that is the coming together, the meeting, the convergence of the ear, the sensory contact that is the coming together, the meeting, the convergence of the nose, the sensory contact that is the coming together, the meeting, the convergence of the tongue, the sensory contact that is the coming together, the meeting, the convergence of the body,

original: ldan pa'ang ma yin /🔽mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /🔽gzugs med pa /
analyzed: ldan pa'ang ma yin / mi ldan pa'ang ma yin / gzugs med pa /
translated: and the sensory contact that is the coming together, the meeting, the convergence of the mind, and whatever there is of a bodhisattva, and whatever there is of the perfection of wisdom, and whatever there is of seeking—all those dharmas are not conjoined and not disjoined.🔽They are immaterial, unrevealed,🔽ungraspable,

original: bltar med pa /🔽thogs pa med pa /
analyzed: bltar med pa /🔽thogs pa med pa /
translated: and not something with which one can come into contact.

original: mtshan @183a *// nyid gcig pa ste /
analyzed: mtshan @183a *// nyid gcig pa ste /
translated: It is the same in terms of its defining characteristic.

original: 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o //
translated: In this way, it is without defining characteristic.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las kyang btsal bar mi bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las kyang btsal bar mi bya /
translated: furthermore, bodhisattva great beings should not search for the perfection of wisdom🔽in the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the eye,

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //
translated: nor should they search for it anywhere other than the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the eye.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las kyang btsal bar mi bya /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las kyang btsal bar mi bya /
translated: They should not search for it in the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the ear,

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //
translated: nor should they search for it anywhere other than the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the ear.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las kyang btsal bar mi bya /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las kyang btsal bar mi bya /
translated: They should not search for it in the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the nose,

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //
translated: nor should they search for it anywhere other than the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the nose.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las kyang btsal bar mi bya /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las kyang btsal bar mi bya /
translated: You should not search for the bodhisattva great being in the condition that is the causal factor of the sensation that arises from the contact of the tongue and tastes,

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //🔽lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las kyang btsal bar mi bya /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las kyang btsal bar mi bya /
translated: nor should you search for the bodhisattva great being apart from the condition that is the causal factor of the sensation that arises from the contact of the tongue and tastes.🔽You should not search for the bodhisattva great being in the condition that is the causal factor of the sensation that arises from the contact of the body and touchables,

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //🔽yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las kyang btsal bar mi bya //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las kyang btsal bar mi bya //
translated: nor should you search for the bodhisattva great being apart from the condition that is the causal factor of the sensation that arises from the contact of the body and touchables.🔽You should not search for the bodhisattva great being in the condition that is the causal factor of the sensation that arises from the contact of the mental faculty and mental objects,

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //
translated: nor should you search for the bodhisattva great being apart from the condition that is the causal factor of the sensation that arises from the contact of the mental faculty and mental objects.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

translated: It is like this: the feeling that is a condition for eye contact, the feeling that is a condition for ear contact, the feeling that is a condition for nose contact,🔽the feeling that is a condition for tongue contact, the feeling that is a condition for body contact, the feeling that is a condition for thinking-mind contact,

translated: the bodhisattva,

translated: the perfection of wisdom, and the quest—all these dharmas are not conjoined and not disjoined;🔽they are not dark and not bright;

original: gzugs med pa /🔽bltar med pa /
analyzed: gzugs med pa / bltar med pa /
translated: they are not manifest and not unmanifest;🔽they are not diminished and not increased;🔽they are not taken away and not given;

analyzed: 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o //

analyzed: tshor ba las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o // sred pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya /

analyzed: sred pa las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //
translated: nor should you search for it apart from craving.

analyzed: len pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya /

analyzed: len pa las gzhan du'ang @184b btsal bar mi bya'o // srid pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya /

analyzed: srid pa las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o // skye ba las kyang btsal bar mi bya /

analyzed: skye ba las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o // rga shi las kyang btsal bar mi bya /

analyzed: rga shi las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //
translated: It should not be sought in old age and death, nor should it be sought apart from old age and death.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /

translated: it is because ignorance, volitional factors, consciousness, name and form, the six sense sources, contact,

translated: whatever ear consciousnesses, whatever nose consciousnesses, whatever tongue consciousnesses, whatever body consciousnesses,

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni /

analyzed: ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin / gzugs med pa / bltar med pa /
translated: whatever ear contacts, whatever nose contacts, whatever tongue contacts, whatever body contacts,🔽whatever mental contacts, whatever feelings that arise from the condition of eye contact,🔽whatever feelings that arise from the condition of ear contact, whatever feelings that arise from the condition of nose contact, whatever feelings that arise from the condition of tongue contact, whatever feelings that arise from the condition of body contact,🔽whatever feelings that arise from the condition of mental contact,🔽whatever forms, whatever sounds, whatever odors, whatever tastes, whatever tangibles,🔽whatever phenomena, whatever eye sense spheres,

analyzed: thogs pa med pa /

analyzed: mtshan nyid gcig pa ste / 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o //

analyzed: koo shi ka /

translated: and whatever perfection of wisdom there is, and whatever searching there is, all those dharmas are not conjoined and not disjoined,

analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya /

analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //
