analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya /
translated: It should not be sought in the perfection of concentration,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //
translated: nor should it be sought elsewhere than in the perfection of concentration.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya /
translated: It should not be sought in the perfection of wisdom,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //
translated: nor should it be sought elsewhere than in the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: de ni / 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /
translated: it is because the perfection of giving, the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni /🔽ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni / ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: the perfection of concentration, the perfection of wisdom, the bodhisattva, the perfection of wisdom, and the investigation—all those dharmas

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /🔽gzugs med pa /🔽bltar med pa /🔽thogs pa med pa /
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin / gzugs med pa / bltar med pa / thogs pa med pa /
translated: are not conjoined and are not disjoined;

original: mtshan nyid gcig pa ste /
analyzed: mtshan nyid gcig pa ste /
translated: they are formless, invisible, nonresisting, with a single defining mark—

original: 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o //
translated: that is to say, no defining mark.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /🔽nang stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya /🔽nang stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni / nang stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya / nang stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //
translated: Moreover, Subhūti, the bodhisattva great beings should not search for the perfection of wisdom🔽in inner emptiness,🔽nor should they search for it anywhere other than inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa @185b nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya /
analyzed: phyi stong pa @185b nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya /
translated: They should not search for it in outer emptiness,

original: phyi stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //
translated: nor should they search for it anywhere other than outer emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya /
translated: They should not search for it in inner and outer emptiness,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //
translated: nor should they search for it anywhere other than inner and outer emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya /
translated: They should not search for it in the emptiness of emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //
translated: nor should they search for it anywhere other than the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya /
translated: They should not search for it in great emptiness,

original: chen po stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o /
translated: nor should they search for it anywhere other than great emptiness.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya /
translated: They should not search for it in ultimate emptiness,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya /🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o // 'dus byas stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya / 'dus byas stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //
translated: nor should one seek it apart from the emptiness of ultimate reality.🔽One should not seek it in the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,🔽nor should one seek it apart from the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya /🔽'dus ma byas song pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya / 'dus ma byas song pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya /
translated: One should not seek it in the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena,🔽nor should one seek it apart from the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya /
translated: One should not seek it in the emptiness of what is beyond extremes,🔽nor should one seek it apart from the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //🔽dor ba med pa stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o // dor ba med pa stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya /
translated: One should not seek it in the emptiness of what is limitless,🔽nor should one seek it apart from the emptiness of what is limitless.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //
translated: One should not seek it in the emptiness of what is not to be discarded,🔽nor should one seek it apart from the emptiness of what is not to be discarded.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya /
translated: It should not be sought in emptiness of intrinsic nature,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //
translated: nor should it be sought elsewhere than in emptiness of intrinsic nature.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar @186a *//
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar @186a *//
translated: It should not be sought in the emptiness of all phenomena,

original: mi bya / chos thams cad stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: mi bya / chos thams cad stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //
translated: nor should it be sought elsewhere than in the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya /
translated: It should not be sought in the emptiness of defining attributes,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //
translated: nor should it be sought elsewhere than in the emptiness of defining attributes.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya /
translated: It should not be sought in the emptiness of nonapprehension,

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //
translated: nor should it be sought elsewhere than in the emptiness of nonapprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya /
translated: It should not be sought in the emptiness of nonthings,

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //
translated: nor should it be sought elsewhere than in the emptiness of nonthings.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya /
translated: It should not be sought in the emptiness of essential nature,

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya /
translated: nor should it be sought elsewhere than the emptiness of essential nature.🔽It should not be sought in the emptiness of the non-existence of own-being,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //
translated: nor should it be sought elsewhere than the emptiness of the non-existence of own-being.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: de ni / 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /
translated: it is because the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /
translated: It is the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of the conditioned, the emptiness of the unconditioned, the emptiness of what is beyond extremes, the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless,

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / mi dmigs @186b pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / mi dmigs @186b pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /
translated: the emptiness of what is not to be discarded, the emptiness of intrinsic nature, the emptiness of all things, the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics, and the emptiness of nonapprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /🔽btsal pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni /🔽ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /🔽gzugs med pa /🔽bltar med pa /🔽thogs pa med pa /🔽mtshan nyid gcig pa ste /🔽'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o //🔽koo shi ka /🔽gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /🔽dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las kyang btsal bar mi bya /🔽dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //🔽de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /🔽btsal pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni /🔽ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /🔽gzugs med pa /🔽bltar med pa /🔽thogs pa med pa /🔽mtshan nyid gcig pa ste /🔽'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o //🔽koo shi ka /🔽gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /🔽dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las kyang btsal bar mi bya /🔽dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //🔽de ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: de ni / 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni /🔽ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni / ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: it is thus: the four establishments of mindfulness and the bodhisattva are not two, nor are they divided, nor are they differentiated.

original: mi ldan pa pa'ang ma yin /🔽gzugs med pa /🔽bltar med pa /
analyzed: mi ldan pa pa'ang ma yin / gzugs med pa / bltar med pa /
translated: They are not conjoined and not disjoined.

original: thogs pa med pa /
analyzed: thogs pa med pa /
translated: They are not massive and not discrete.🔽They are not small and not large.

original: mtshan nyid gcig pa ste /
analyzed: mtshan nyid gcig pa ste /
translated: They are not the same and not different.

original: 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o //
translated: They are not apprehensible and not unapprehensible.🔽They are not black and not white.🔽They are not red and not yellow.

original: koo shi ka /🔽gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: koo shi ka / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
translated: Kauśika,

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams las kyang btsal bar mi bya /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams las kyang btsal bar mi bya /
translated: further, the bodhisattva great beings should not search for the perfection of wisdom in the four right efforts,

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //
translated: nor should they search for it apart from the four right efforts.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,
it is thus:🔽the four right efforts and the bodhisattva are not two, nor are they divided, nor are they differentiated.

original: 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni /
translated: Thus, all these dharmas—whatever the right efforts are, whatever the bodhisattvas are, whatever the perfection of wisdom is, and whatever the investigation is—🔽

original: ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /🔽gzugs med pa /
analyzed: ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin / gzugs med pa /
translated: In this way, those that are the four right efforts, those that are the bodhisattva, those that are the perfection of wisdom, and those that are the searches—all those dharmas are not conjoined and not disjoined.

original: bltar med pa /
analyzed: bltar med pa /
translated: They are immaterial, unrevealed,

original: thogs pa med pa /🔽mtshan nyid gcig pa ste /
analyzed: thogs pa med pa / mtshan nyid gcig pa ste /
translated: unobstructed,

original: 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o //
translated: and of a single mark, which is to say, they are unmarked.

original: koo shi ka /🔽gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: koo shi ka / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
translated: “Kauśika,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams las kyang btsal bar mi bya /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams las kyang btsal bar mi bya /
translated: further, bodhisattva great beings should not search for the perfection of wisdom in the bases of supernatural power,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o //🔽de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: nor should they search for it anywhere other than the bases of supernatural power.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: If you ask why, Kauśika,🔽it is because the bases of supernatural power are empty of the bases of supernatural power.

original: de ni / 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni /🔽ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni / ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: It is thus: those dharmas which are the bases of supernatural power, which are the bodhisattva, which are the perfection of wisdom, and which are the search,

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: all of them are not connected and not disconnected,

original: gzugs med pa /
analyzed: gzugs med pa /
translated: they are formless,

original: bltar med pa /
analyzed: bltar med pa /
translated: cannot be pointed out,

original: thogs pa med pa /
analyzed: thogs pa med pa /
translated: have no obstruction,

original: mtshan nyid gcig pa ste /
analyzed: mtshan nyid gcig pa ste /
translated: and have one mark—

original: 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o //
translated: that is to say, no mark.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: koo shi ka /🔽de ni / 'di ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /

translated: Kauśika,🔽it is because the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all things, the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities are themselves omniscience, and omniscience is itself the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni /
analyzed: btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni /
translated: All those phenomena—that is, the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all things, the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities—

original: ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan ba'ang ma yin /

analyzed: koo shi ka / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba ni / mngon par shes pa rnams las kyang btsal bar mi bya /
translated: “Kauśika,🔽further, bodhisattva great beings should not search for the perfection of wisdom in the clairvoyances,

original: chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The suchness of the water element is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽chu'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // chu'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: the thusness of the water element is also not the perfection of wisdom,🔽and apart from the thusness of the water element there is also no perfection of wisdom.🔽The real nature of the water element is also not the perfection of wisdom,

original: chu'i khams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: chu'i khams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: and apart from the real nature of the water element there is also no perfection of wisdom.

original: me'i khams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: me'i khams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The fire element is also not the perfection of wisdom,

original: me'i khams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: me'i khams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: and apart from the fire element there is also no perfection of wisdom.🔽The thusness of the fire element is also not the perfection of wisdom,

original: me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽me'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // me'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: and apart from the thusness of the fire element there is also no perfection of wisdom.🔽The real nature of the fire element is also not the perfection of wisdom,

original: me'i khams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: me'i khams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: and apart from the real nature of the fire element there is also no perfection of wisdom.

original: rlung gi khams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: rlung gi khams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The element of wind is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: rlung gi khams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: rlung gi khams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not elsewhere than the element of wind.🔽The suchness of the element of wind is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽rlung gi khams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // rlung gi khams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not elsewhere than the suchness of the element of wind.🔽The true dharmic nature of the element of wind is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: rlung gi khams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽nam mkha'i khams kyang @200a *//🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /🔽nam mkha'i khams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: rlung gi khams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // nam mkha'i khams kyang @200a *// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin / nam mkha'i khams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not elsewhere than the true dharmic nature of the element of wind.🔽The element of space is not the perfection of wisdom.🔽The perfection of wisdom is not elsewhere than the element of space.

original: nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The suchness of the element of space is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽nam mkha'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // nam mkha'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not other than the suchness of the space element.🔽The dharmatā of the space element is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: nam mkha'i khams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not other than the dharmatā of the space element.🔽The element of consciousness is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not other than the element of consciousness.🔽The suchness of the element of consciousness is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not other than the suchness of the element of consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The dharmatā of the element of consciousness is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽ma rig pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // ma rig pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: the transcendent perfection of wisdom is not extraneous to the real nature of the consciousness element.🔽Ignorance is not the transcendent perfection of wisdom.

original: ma rig pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: ma rig pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The transcendent perfection of wisdom is not extraneous to ignorance.🔽The real nature of ignorance is not the transcendent perfection of wisdom.🔽The transcendent perfection of wisdom is not extraneous to the real nature of ignorance.🔽The suchness of ignorance is not the transcendent perfection of wisdom.

original: ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes @200b rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽ma rig pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes @200b rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // ma rig pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The transcendent perfection of wisdom is not extraneous to the suchness of ignorance.🔽The real nature of ignorance is not the transcendent perfection of wisdom.

original: ma rig pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽'du byed kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: ma rig pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // 'du byed kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The transcendent perfection of wisdom is not extraneous to the real nature of ignorance.🔽Conditionings are not the transcendent perfection of wisdom.

original: 'du byed las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: 'du byed las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: The transcendent perfection of wisdom is not extraneous to conditionings.

original: 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The suchness of volitional factors is also not the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: Nor is there the perfection of wisdom elsewhere, apart from the suchness of volitional factors.

original: 'du byed kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The true dharmic nature of volitional factors is also not the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'du byed kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: Nor is there the perfection of wisdom elsewhere, apart from the true dharmic nature of volitional factors.

original: rnam par shes pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: Consciousness is also not the perfection of wisdom.

original: rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: Nor is there the perfection of wisdom elsewhere, apart from consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The suchness of consciousness is also not the perfection of wisdom.

original: rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: Nor is there the perfection of wisdom elsewhere, apart from the suchness of consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The true dharmic nature of consciousness is also not the perfection of wisdom.

original: rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: the dharmatā of consciousness is not the perfection of wisdom,

original: ming dang gzugs kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: form and feeling are not the perfection of wisdom,

original: ming dang gzugs las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: apart from form and feeling the perfection of wisdom does not exist,

original: ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: the suchness of form and feeling is not the perfection of wisdom,

original: ming @201a *// dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: ming @201a *// dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: apart from the suchness of form and feeling the perfection of wisdom does not exist,

original: ming dang gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: the true dharmic nature of form and feeling is not the perfection of wisdom,

original: ming dang gzugs kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: apart from the true dharmic nature of form and feeling the perfection of wisdom does not exist,

original: skye mched drug kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: skye mched drug kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: the six sense fields are not the perfection of wisdom,

original: skye mched drug las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: skye mched drug las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not other than the six sense fields.🔽The suchness of the six sense fields is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽skye mched drug gi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // skye mched drug gi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not other than the suchness of the six sense fields.🔽The true dharmic nature of the six sense fields is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: skye mched drug gi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: skye mched drug gi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not other than the true dharmic nature of the six sense fields.

original: reg pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /🔽reg pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽reg pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: reg pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin / reg pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // reg pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: Contact is not the perfection of wisdom.🔽The perfection of wisdom is not other than contact.🔽The suchness of contact is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: reg pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: reg pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not other than the suchness of contact.

original: reg pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: reg pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: the real nature of contact is not the perfection of wisdom,

original: reg pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: reg pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: and apart from the real nature of contact there is no perfection of wisdom.

original: tshor ba'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: tshor ba'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: Feeling is not the perfection of wisdom,

original: tshor ba @201b las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: tshor ba @201b las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: and apart from feeling there is no perfection of wisdom.

original: tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The suchness of feeling is not the perfection of wisdom,

original: tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: and apart from the suchness of feeling there is no perfection of wisdom.

original: tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The real nature of feeling is not the perfection of wisdom,

original: tshor ba'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽sred pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: tshor ba'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // sred pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: and apart from the real nature of feeling there is no perfection of wisdom.🔽Craving is not the perfection of wisdom,

original: sred pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: sred pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: and apart from craving there is no perfection of wisdom.

original: sred pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: sred pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: the real nature of craving is not the perfection of wisdom,

original: sred pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽sred pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: sred pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // sred pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: and the perfection of wisdom is not other than the real nature of craving.🔽The real nature of craving is not the perfection of wisdom,

original: sred pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: sred pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: and the perfection of wisdom is not other than the real nature of craving.

original: len pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /🔽len pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: len pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin / len pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: Grasping is not the perfection of wisdom,🔽and the perfection of wisdom is not other than grasping.

original: len pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /🔽len pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: len pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin / len pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: The real nature of grasping is not the perfection of wisdom,🔽and the perfection of wisdom is not other than the real nature of grasping.

original: len pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: len pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The real nature of grasping is not the perfection of wisdom,🔽and the perfection of wisdom is not other than the real nature of grasping.

original: len pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: len pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not other than the reality of appropriation.

original: srid pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /🔽srid pa las gud na'ang shes rab @202a *//🔽kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽srid pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: srid pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin / srid pa las gud na'ang shes rab @202a *// kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // srid pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: Existence is not the perfection of wisdom.🔽The perfection of wisdom is not other than existence.🔽The suchness of existence is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: srid pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽srid pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: srid pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // srid pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not other than the suchness of existence.🔽The reality of existence is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: srid pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽skye ba'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: srid pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // skye ba'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not other than the reality of existence.🔽Birth is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: skye ba las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: skye ba las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not other than birth.

original: skye ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: skye ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The suchness of birth is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: skye ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽skye ba'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: skye ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // skye ba'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: Apart from the suchness of birth there is also no perfection of wisdom.🔽The dharmatā of birth is also not the perfection of wisdom.

translated: Nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the emptiness of the ultimate.🔽The suchness of the emptiness of the ultimate is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /

translated: Nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the suchness of the emptiness of the ultimate.🔽The true nature of the emptiness of the ultimate is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: Nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the true nature of the emptiness of the ultimate.

analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of conditioned phenomena is not the perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //

analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of the conditioned is also not the perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //

analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /

translated: The perfection of wisdom is not elsewhere, apart from the true nature of the emptiness of the conditioned.🔽The emptiness of the unconditioned is also not the perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not elsewhere, apart from the emptiness of the unconditioned.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The thusness of the emptiness of the uncompounded is also not the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: Nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the thusness of the emptiness of the uncompounded.🔽The true dharmic nature of the emptiness of the uncompounded is also not the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: Nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the true dharmic nature of the emptiness of the uncompounded.🔽The emptiness of what transcends limits is also not the perfection of wisdom.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: Nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the emptiness of what transcends limits.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The thusness of the emptiness of what transcends limits is also not the perfection of wisdom.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not elsewhere, apart from the suchness of the emptiness of what transcends limits.🔽The intrinsic nature of the emptiness of what transcends limits is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid @206a *//
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid @206a *//
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not elsewhere, apart from the intrinsic nature of the emptiness of what transcends limits.

original: kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of what is beginningless and endless is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not elsewhere, apart from the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not elsewhere, apart from the suchness of the emptiness of no beginning and end.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The true dharmic nature of the emptiness of no beginning and end is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not elsewhere, apart from the true dharmic nature of the emptiness of no beginning and end.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of no end is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not elsewhere, apart from the emptiness of no end.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of no end is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not elsewhere, apart from the suchness of the emptiness of no end.🔽The emptiness of no beginning and end is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The dharmatā of emptiness that is not discarded is also not the perfection of wisdom.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽rang bzhin stong @206b pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // rang bzhin stong @206b pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is also not outside the dharmatā of emptiness that is not discarded.🔽The emptiness of nature is also not the perfection of wisdom.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is also not outside the emptiness of nature.🔽The suchness of the emptiness of nature is also not the perfection of wisdom.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is also not outside the suchness of the emptiness of nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The dharmatā of the emptiness of nature is also not the perfection of wisdom.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not other than the dharmatā of emptiness of inherent nature.🔽The emptiness of all phenomena is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not other than the emptiness of all phenomena.🔽The suchness of the emptiness of all phenomena is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not other than the suchness of the emptiness of all phenomena.🔽The dharmatā of the emptiness of all phenomena is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not other than the dharmatā of the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of defining characteristics is not the perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // rang gi mtshan @207a *// nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: Nor is there a perfection of wisdom apart from the emptiness of defining characteristics.🔽The suchness of the emptiness of defining characteristics is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: Nor is there a perfection of wisdom apart from the suchness of the emptiness of defining characteristics.🔽The true nature of the emptiness of defining characteristics is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: Nor is there a perfection of wisdom apart from the true nature of the emptiness of defining characteristics.

analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /

analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //

translated: The perfection of wisdom is not elsewhere, apart from the emptiness of non-apprehension.🔽The emptiness of non-apprehension is not the perfection of wisdom.🔽The perfection of wisdom is not elsewhere, apart from the emptiness of non-apprehension.

translated: Nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the bases of supernatural powers.🔽The suchness of the bases of supernatural powers is also not the perfection of wisdom.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //

analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The real nature of the bases of supernatural powers is also not the perfection of wisdom.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not the nature of the bases of supernatural powers, and the perfection of wisdom is not other than the nature of the bases of supernatural powers.

analyzed: dbang po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The faculties are not the perfection of wisdom.

translated: The perfection of wisdom is not other than the suchness of the faculties.🔽The true nature of the faculties is not the perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: bsam gtan rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The meditative stabilities are not the perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: tshad med pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: The suchness of the formless absorptions is also not the perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The real nature of the formless absorptions is also not the perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not somewhere other than the real nature of the formless absorptions.

analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /

translated: The real nature of the liberations is also not the perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not elsewhere, apart from the reality of the liberations.

analyzed: @210b mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not elsewhere, apart from the suchness of the serial actions.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The reality of the serial actions is not the perfection of wisdom.🔽The perfection of wisdom is not elsewhere, apart from the reality of the serial actions.

analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not the reality of the meditative stabilizations.

analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
